1.0.0.name: drupal/bmiaddons

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.0.0.description: Creates additional blocks for the BMI Module by adding a BMI calculator geared towards users of the imperial measurement system, as well as providing imperial and metric forms for calculating BMR, applying the Harris Benedict Formula to your BMR, Body Fat Percentage and Waist to Hip Ratio.
